title: Jordan Klepper Fingers the Pulse - Canada's Trucker Protest | Janicza Bravo
itunes:title: Jordan Klepper Fingers the Pulse - Canada's Trucker Protest | Janicza Bravo
description:
Trevor examines the controversial drill rap genre, Jordan Klepper talks to protesting truckers in Canada, and writer and director Janicza Bravo discusses her movie "Zola."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
